items.sentence: What do you think Tom\'s chances of getting into Harvard are?
When I asked Tom how to do that, he said he didn\'t know how.
We\'ll have a picnic tomorrow, weather permitting, of course.
We\'re going to a new bar tonight. Do you want to come along?
We\'re heading for the beach. Would you like to come with us?
I do not like tea, so I generally drink coffee for breakfast.
I got a phone call from him just as I was about to go to bed.
I have a lot of work to finish up before the end of the week.
Translating is not nearly as easy as many people might think.
Under normal circumstances, Tom would never agree to do that.
We came all the way from Boston just for your birthday party.
What\'s the real reason Tom doesn\'t want to go to the party?
How come you didn\'t tell me Tom was going to Boston with us?
I asked Tom why he thought Mary wouldn\'t be at school today.
She couldn\'t fall asleep because she was thinking about him.
She still loves him even though he doesn\'t love her anymore.
Tom finds it difficult to keep up with the rest of the class.
Tom found Mary an apartment not too far from where she works.
Tom got into a fight with the people who were staring at him.
Tom had to leave the movie theater before the movie was over.
